description:
Diglet liked the singing of DJ Leo`s Dugtrio and wanted to join the group. It appeared at their concert in the Alola region and then later at the place they were staying at. It did an impromptu audition and Dugtrio liked its singing. DJ Leo`s Diglet is an Alolan Form. It wears a wig that was given to it by Rotom Pok√©dex.
After Digda joined the group, the group name became: "Dugtrio and Digda with DJ Leo" or "Digdugleo" for short. It took the center position because DJ Leo`s Dugtrio all wanted the center spot.
name: Digda (DJ Leo)
